pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenic shot of a large, medieval stone castle nestled in a dense forest under an overcast sky. A stone bridge leads to the castle's arched entrance, with people walking along the path. The camera pulls back to reveal a wider, more dramatic view of the entire structure and its surroundings.
